instructions: Tap the Settings app to open it. Tap Safari . Tap Search Engine. On this screen, tap the search engine you want to use as your default. Your options are Google , Yahoo , Bing , and DuckDuckGo . Your setting is automatically saved, so you can start searching using your new default search engine right away.

Tap on the Settings app. Tap Safari . Tap AutoFill . Move the Use Contact Info slider to on/green. Your information should appear in the My Info field. If it doesn't, tap that and browse your address book to find yourself. If you want to save the usernames and passwords you use to log into various websites, slide the Names & Passwords slider to on/green. If you want to save frequently used credit cards to make online purchases quicker, move the Credit Cards slider to on/green. If you don't already have a credit card saved on your iPhone, tap Saved Credit Cards and add a card.

Tap Settings . Tap Accounts & Passwords . Tap App & Website Passwords . You'll be asked to authorize access to this information via Touch ID , Face ID , or your passcode. Do so. A list of all websites that you've got a saved username and password for appears. Search or browse and then tap the one you want to see all of your login info for.

Tap Settings . Tap Safari . Tap Open Links . Choose In New Tab if you want the links you tap to open in a new window in Safari and to have that window immediately come to the front. Choose In Background if you want that new window to go to the background and leave the page you're currently looking at on top.
Tap Settings . Tap Safari . Tap Clear History and Website Data . A menu pops up from the bottom of the screen. In it, tap Clear History and Data .

Tap Settings. Tap Safari. Move the Prevent Cross-Site Tracking slider to on/green. Move the Ask Websites Not to Track Me slider to on/green. This is a voluntary feature, so not all websites will respect it, but some is better than none.
Tap Settings . Tap Safari . Move the Fraudulent Website Warning slider to on/green.
Tap Settings . Tap Safari . Move Block All Cookies to on/green.
Tap Settings . Tap Safari . Move the Check for Apple Pay slider to on/green.
